qas.question: What is Hanover's ranking in terms of size in Germany?
What is the largest Oktoberfest in the world?
In which year did Hanover host the Expo?

context: With a population of <a0_0>518,000<a0_0/>, Hanover is a major centre of Northern Germany and the country's <a1_0>thirteenth largest<a1_0/> city. Hanover also hosts annual commercial trade fairs such as the Hanover Fair and the CeBIT. Every year Hanover hosts the Schützenfest Hannover, the world's largest marksmen's festival, and the Oktoberfest Hannover, the second largest Oktoberfest in the world (beside <a2_0>Oktoberfest of Blumenau<a2_0/>). In 2000, Hanover hosted the world fair Expo 2000. The Hanover fairground, due to numerous extensions, especially for the Expo <a3_0>2000<a3_0/>, is the largest in the world. Hanover is of national importance because of its universities and medical school, its international airport and its large zoo. The city is also a major crossing point of railway lines and highways (<a4_0>Autobahnen<a4_0/>), connecting European main lines in both the east-west (Berlin–Ruhr area) and north-south (Hamburg–Munich, etc.) directions.
